annotation.spannedText: You need to consider how likely you are to come in contact with an infected animal

classMention.mentionClass: You need to consider how likely you are to come in contact with an infected animal

annotation.spannedText: I'd say that vaccination is like insurance - and, as Australian Government suggests, if you cannot afford travel insurance, you cannot afford to travel

annotation.spannedText: You cannot always prevent bites- sometimes it s just wrong place, wrong animal
